common.longPressHint: Kanyĩta nduku nĩnĩ na nthele ũthiĩ ũkĩa

splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Vata Wofisi ya IEBC ĩla ĩkũvĩkana
splash.disclaimer: Etĩkĩla ũtambĩko wa athĩ waku nĩguo ũvate senita ya IEBC ĩla ĩkũvĩkana, ũsyokee wĩonanie wa kũthiĩ kũũ.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Tethya etĩkĩla athĩ ũu wĩkalĩtye mbĩta na ũkũna kũũ ĩngĩ

search.placeholder: Vata wofisi ya IEBC na kawnti, kanstituensi, kana athĩ...
search.noMatchQuery: Ndĩna wofisi ĩsomanaa na "{{query}}". Kethya ũvate ũla ũngĩ.
search.noOfficesInArea: Ndĩna wofisi ya IEBC ũũ wĩ.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Etĩkĩla ũtambĩko wa athĩ nĩguo wone kyalo kĩa kũendya ngali, wĩ nzĩla kũuma ũũ wĩ ũkĩthiĩ wofisi ĩno.
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Antu nĩmendaa kwĩtĩkĩla angĩ wofisi ĩno nĩ ya kwendeka
bottomSheet.confirmThis: Kwĩtĩkĩla Wofisi Ĩno Nĩ ya Kwendeka
bottomSheet.within500m: Nĩwagĩla ũvĩkĩĩne na mita 500 kũma wofisi
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Wĩ mita {{distance}} kũma kũũ. Tethya wĩsyokee mita {{maxDistance}} kũma wofisi nĩguo wĩtĩkĩle.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Nĩwendekaa ũtambĩko wa athĩ nĩguo wĩtĩkĩle. Etĩkĩla ũtambĩko wa athĩ ũkethye ĩngĩ.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Kanyĩta wofisi nĩguo wone nzĩla ya Google Maps.
bottomSheet.trafficSurchargeIncluded: Kyalo nĩkũneneaa kyalo kĩa ngali nyĩngĩ

layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Wofisi syĩsĩ sya IEBC nthĩ ya Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Mĩsĩtũ ya palamen na sya ũtambĩko wa Kenya ta kũvĩkĩa IEBC. Kĩla kĩvandũ kĩvonanagia kanstituensi ĩmwe na koodi na ndetwa yayo.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Manyĩtyo ma mahoki ma kũvata nthĩ yĩsĩ (ũvoo mũingĩ mũno — wendaa nthi ĩndũthĩ nĩguo ũtwĩke)
layers.counties: Kawnti sya Kenya na Ũvoo wa Antu
layers.countiesDesc: Manyĩtyo ma mĩsĩtũ ya kawnti nthĩ yĩsĩ
layers.myLocationDesc: Onania athĩ waku wa ũmũthĩ mũthembani
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Kyũsa kilĩva nĩguo wethe mũthemba waku. Nĩwendaa kwĩla kilĩva kyĩngĩ kya ũvoo kĩla mũthemba mũingĩ nĩguo wone wega.

contribute.title: Ongela Athĩ wa Wofisi ũla Ũsavaa
contribute.description: Tũtetheesye kũthemba wofisi syĩsĩ sya IEBC nthĩ ya Kenya kũuma wĩka ũvoo wa athĩ ũla wa kwendeka.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Kenyeta kĩovokanyo kĩa Google Maps kana makoo
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Kivĩonyo kĩa wofisi, saa kana ũũ ũvĩkĩĩne nĩkũtetheesya kwĩtĩkĩla
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Vuta na ũkĩnye kana kanyĩta nĩguo wĩke
contribute.movePin: Vuta pin nĩguo wethe athĩ wa kwendeka
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Kĩla wĩkĩte nĩkĩtũmĩtwe na kĩkaonwo nĩ antu matetheesya.
contribute.submissionNote: Menyithya: Kwĩtĩkĩla kwa nthaka nĩkũtetheesya ũthembanyo. Nĩmũvea nĩguo wĩkĩte!
contribute.errorLocation: Tethya ũtũme makoo ma athĩ wa wofisi
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Makoo ma ũthũkũ. Tethya ona latitude na longitude.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Ũtambĩko wa athĩ nĩmũnyiithĩtwe. Etĩkĩla ũtambĩko wa athĩ.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Kũvata athĩ kũthĩĩtwe. Tethya wĩkĩle makoo na nthele.
contribute.parseError: Kyũũmĩ kya ũthũkũ. Tethya kenyeta kĩovokanyo kĩa Google Maps kana makoo.
